name: Slap Masters
description:
There is only one rule! Slap or get slapped!

Tap the screen at the right time to slap.

Can you make your way to the end?

Slap your enemies so hard that you can collect gold with them and empower yourself for to get even more gold!
developers: OMICRON BILISIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: OMICRON BILISIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
